game.name: My Adventure Book 2
game.description:
It all began when a small boy was alone at his home and suddenly rushed to a table where he found a book full of adventurous stories. As he opened a book, a force came into existence and sucked him in it. Now he only wants to come out of it and lead a happy life again. However, the problem is that he cannot complete the mission without your help. Are you ready to help this cute boy during his bad time? Join My Adventure Book 2 and get a chance to be a part of the greatest adventure you have experienced ever!

The boy has so many expectations from you so help him now to find the way back to his home in this brand new adventure game. There are plenty of items around you will find to choose from. Come forward and get ready to interact with objects and characters to check what will happen next! This little boy has magically got transported inside an adventure book so you find him a bit helpless and confused. Use your brain power to solve the puzzles in this free online escaping game!

Your mission is to help the boy to seek for the path to his home which is in the real world. However, he has to help the person who is in distress before finding the way out of the book. Collect the clues and use them to solve the logical-based puzzles and teasers in this point and click puzzle adventure video game! Make sure to help the one who is in trouble first to find out a key to come back to home before dinner. Apply the mouse to navigate and left mouse button to select and interact in this cool HTML5 puzzle game for kids!
